title: Secret Service Agent
desc:
***VIP Guest List** (2x, Charge 120%)*
Choose a player who placed in the top 3 the prior evening. They will learn every lower scoring player who visits them and may choose which ones to refuse. You will roleblock any refused visitors.

***Threat Elimination** (1x, Charge 160%, Passive, Locked)*
Unlocked when you place in the top 3. If you have ammo, your target may also choose one lower-scoring, visiting player for you to attack. Ammo is spent if you attack a player.

***First Aid** (Passive)*
Triggers when you score above 55%. Your target and any lower-scoring player who visits your target gain 0.1x additional defense power for that night. 

***Emergency Response** (Passive)*
You will automatically roleblock and attack anyone who attempts to rampage attack your target. However, your other abilities for the night will fail.

***Stoic Professional** (Passive)*
You are immune to roleblocks, and immune to any negative effects potentially triggered by your messages during the day phase.
